hero.title: AltesHaus
hero.subtitle: Authentic German Cuisine
hero.description: Experience the perfect blend of German hospitality and Macedonian flavors in an atmosphere of timeless elegance.

story.title: Our Story
story.subtitle: Where German tradition meets Macedonian heritage
story.culinaryBridgeText: In the heart of Mönchengladbach, AltesHaus represents a unique culinary journey that bridges two rich gastronomic traditions. Our restaurant celebrates the hearty, authentic flavors of German cuisine while honoring the vibrant, aromatic specialties of Macedonia.
story.passionArtistryText: Every dish tells a story of tradition, passion, and the artistry of combining time-honored recipes with fresh, locally-sourced ingredients. We believe that great food brings people together, creating moments of joy and connection that transcend cultural boundaries.
story.quote: Cooking is not just about feeding the body, but nourishing the soul and creating connections that transcend borders.

featuredDishes.title: Featured Dishes
featuredDishes.subtitle: Discover our signature creations that perfectly blend German traditions with Macedonian influences, crafted with passion and served with pride
featuredDishes.schnitzelAjvarDesc: Traditional German schnitzel elevated with our house-made Macedonian ajvar sauce and seasonal vegetables, creating a perfect harmony of flavors.
featuredDishes.macedonianKebapiDesc: Hand-rolled spiced meat cylinders grilled to perfection, served with fresh onions and traditional bread, bringing authentic Balkan flavors to your table.
featuredDishes.balkanSauerbratenDesc: Classic German pot roast with a Balkan twist, marinated in wine and Macedonian spices, slow-cooked to tender perfection with rich, complex flavors.
featuredDishes.fullMenuSubtitle: Discover more culinary masterpieces that celebrate the perfect fusion of German tradition and Macedonian heritage

contact.title: Visit Us
contact.subtitle: Located in the heart of Mönchengladbach, we're ready to welcome you for an unforgettable dining experience
contact.loveToHear: We'd love to hear from you

about.title: About AltesHaus
about.subtitle: Discover the story behind our passion for authentic German cuisine and traditional Macedonian specialties
about.heritageSubtitle: A legacy of culinary excellence spanning two cultures
about.founded2009Text: AltesHaus was born from a vision to create a unique dining experience that celebrates the rich culinary traditions of both Germany and Macedonia. Our founder, Chef Marcus Weber, spent years perfecting the art of fusion cuisine.
about.culturalBridgeText: We believe food is a universal language that brings people together. Our menu reflects this philosophy, offering dishes that honor traditional recipes while embracing innovative techniques.
about.localCommitmentText: We source our ingredients from local farmers and suppliers whenever possible, supporting our community while ensuring the freshest flavors in every dish we serve.
about.philosophySubtitle: The principles that guide our culinary journey
about.freshLocalText: We source the finest local ingredients, supporting our community while ensuring exceptional quality in every dish we serve.
about.culturalBridgePhilosophyText: We believe food transcends borders, bringing together German precision and Macedonian warmth in perfect harmony.
about.passionHeartText: Every dish is crafted with love and dedication, creating memorable experiences that nourish both body and soul.
about.experienceStorySubtitle: Join us for an unforgettable dining experience where German tradition meets Macedonian heritage
about.visitUsTodaySubtitle: Located in the heart of Mönchengladbach's historic district

menu.title: Our Menu
menu.subtitle: A culinary journey through German tradition and Macedonian heritage, where every dish tells a story of passion and artistry
menu.appetizersDesc: Elegant starters to awaken your palate
menu.germanClassicsDesc: Traditional dishes from the heart of Germany
menu.fusionDishesDesc: Where German tradition meets Macedonian soul
menu.dessertsDesc: Sweet endings to perfect your experience
menu.beveragesDesc: Carefully curated drinks to complement your meal
menu.readyToExperienceSubtitle: Reserve your table today and embark on a culinary journey that bridges cultures and creates unforgettable memories
menu.ajvarBruschettaStory: A delightful fusion where Italian tradition meets Macedonian flavors. Our house-made ajvar, crafted from fire-roasted red peppers, crowns artisanal sourdough bread.
menu.ajvarBruschettaIngredients: Sourdough bread, House-made ajvar, Fresh basil, Extra virgin olive oil, Goat cheese, Balsamic reduction
menu.kasespatzleBitesStory: Traditional Swabian comfort food reimagined as elegant bite-sized portions. Each morsel delivers the soul-warming essence of Alpine cuisine.
menu.kasespatzleBitesIngredients: Fresh spätzle, Gruyère cheese, Caramelized onions, Fresh chives, Butter, Black pepper
menu.balkanMezzePlatteStory: A journey through the Balkans on a single plate. Each element tells a story of sun-drenched valleys and ancient culinary traditions.
menu.balkanMezzePlatteIngredients: Homemade hummus, Shopska salad, Kajmak cheese, Cured olives, Fresh flatbread, Roasted peppers
menu.wienerSchnitzelStory: The crown jewel of Austrian-German cuisine. Our veal is hand-selected, tenderized with care, and coated in golden breadcrumbs that shatter at first bite.
menu.wienerSchnitzelIngredients: Premium veal cutlet, Fresh breadcrumbs, Free-range eggs, Clarified butter, Lemon wedge, Lingonberry sauce
menu.sauerbratenStory: The "Rhineland Roast" - a testament to German patience and precision. Marinated for days in wine and spices, then slow-roasted to perfection.
menu.sauerbratenIngredients: Beef roast, Red wine marinade, Juniper berries, Bay leaves, Ginger snaps, Root vegetables
menu.currywurstDeluxeStory: Berlin street food elevated to fine dining. Our artisanal bratwurst meets a complex curry sauce that balances sweet, spicy, and umami.
menu.currywurstDeluxeIngredients: House-made bratwurst, Curry powder blend, Tomato base, Onions, Paprika, Fresh herbs
menu.tavceGravceStory: Macedonia's national dish, slow-cooked in traditional clay pots. Each bean absorbs the rich flavors of paprika, onions, and Mediterranean herbs.
menu.tavceGravceIngredients: White beans, Paprika, Onions, Tomatoes, Bay leaves, Olive oil
menu.kebapiSkopjeStyleStory: Hand-rolled cylinders of seasoned meat, grilled over open flames. Served with fresh onions and warm lepinja bread, just like in Skopje's old bazaar.
menu.kebapiSkopjeStyleIngredients: Ground beef and lamb, Secret spice blend, Fresh onions, Lepinja bread, Kajmak, Ajvar
menu.shopskaSaladSupremeStory: The colors of the Macedonian flag in a bowl. Crisp vegetables crowned with authentic sirene cheese, dressed in golden olive oil.
menu.shopskaSaladSupremeIngredients: Tomatoes, Cucumbers, Onions, Peppers, Sirene cheese, Olive oil, Wine vinegar
menu.schnitzelMitAjvarStory: Our signature fusion masterpiece. Traditional German schnitzel meets the fiery passion of Macedonian ajvar in perfect harmony.
menu.schnitzelMitAjvarIngredients: Pork schnitzel, House-made ajvar, Roasted vegetables, Fresh herbs, Lemon, Paprika oil
menu.balkanSauerbratenStory: German tradition enhanced with Balkan soul. Our sauerbraten is marinated with Macedonian wine and spices, creating a unique cross-cultural experience.
menu.balkanSauerbratenIngredients: Beef roast, Macedonian wine, Balkan spices, Roasted peppers, Traditional gravy, Seasonal vegetables
menu.spatzleCarbonaraBalkanStory: Italian technique meets German pasta and Balkan flavors. Creamy, rich, and utterly unique - a dish that tells the story of European unity.
menu.spatzleCarbonaraBalkanIngredients: Fresh spätzle, Pancetta, Free-range eggs, Parmesan, Kajmak, Black pepper, Fresh parsley
menu.blackForestCakeStory: The legendary Schwarzwälder Kirschtorte, crafted with authentic Kirsch from the Black Forest. Each layer tells a story of German confectionery mastery.
menu.blackForestCakeIngredients: Chocolate sponge, Fresh cherries, Kirsch liqueur, Whipped cream, Dark chocolate shavings, Cherry compote
menu.baklavaFusionStory: Traditional Macedonian baklava with a modern twist. Layers of phyllo pastry embrace a mixture of nuts and honey, finished with a touch of German precision.
menu.baklavaFusionIngredients: Phyllo pastry, Mixed nuts, Honey syrup, Cinnamon, Butter, Rose water
menu.apfelstrudelModernStory: Classic Austrian apple strudel reimagined. Paper-thin pastry wraps spiced apples, served warm with vanilla sauce and a hint of Balkan honey.
menu.apfelstrudelModernIngredients: Strudel pastry, Granny Smith apples, Cinnamon, Raisins, Breadcrumbs, Vanilla sauce, Balkan honey
menu.germanWineSelectionStory: Carefully curated wines from German vineyards, each bottle selected to complement our cuisine. From crisp Rieslings to robust Spätburgunders.
menu.germanWineSelectionIngredients: Riesling, Gewürztraminer, Spätburgunder, Müller-Thurgau, Silvaner, Eiswein
menu.macedonianRakijaStory: Traditional fruit brandies from Macedonia's finest distilleries. Each sip carries the essence of sun-ripened fruits and centuries-old traditions.
menu.macedonianRakijaIngredients: Grape rakija, Plum rakija, Apple rakija, Pear rakija, Honey rakija, Herb-infused varieties
menu.craftBeerSelectionStory: Local and German craft beers that pair perfectly with our dishes. From light wheat beers to rich, malty bocks.
menu.craftBeerSelectionIngredients: Weissbier, Pilsner, Märzen, Bock, Kölsch, Local craft varieties

footer.tagline: Where German tradition meets Macedonian heritage
footer.aboutUsText: Authentic German cuisine with traditional Macedonian specialties, crafted with passion and served with pride in the heart of Mönchengladbach.
footer.stayConnectedText: Subscribe to receive updates about our latest dishes, special events, and exclusive offers
footer.privacyRespect: We respect your privacy. Unsubscribe at any time.
